Uses of Package
org.actioncontroller.exceptions

  • Packages that use org.actioncontroller.exceptions 
    Package Description
    org.actioncontroller
    Action Controller is a framework that takes "controller" classes and generates ApiControllerAction for each method annotated with a "routing mapper annotation" such as GET.
    org.actioncontroller.exceptions  
    org.actioncontroller.httpserver  
    org.actioncontroller.jakarta  
    org.actioncontroller.servlet  
    org.actioncontroller.values.json  
  • Classes in org.actioncontroller.exceptions used by org.actioncontroller 
    Class Description
    ActionControllerConfigurationCompositeException
    Collects all exceptions during configuration to give a total view of all configuration exceptions that may have occurred.
    HttpActionException
    Indicates that an error happened during the invocation of an action and that the user agent should receive the HTTP HttpActionException.statusCode.
  • Classes in org.actioncontroller.exceptions used by org.actioncontroller.exceptions 
    Class Description
    ActionControllerConfigurationException
    Thrown when something goes wrong during setup of a controller or the corresponding mapping.
    ApiControllerCompositeException
    Collects all exceptions during configuration of a specific controller
    HttpActionException
    Indicates that an error happened during the invocation of an action and that the user agent should receive the HTTP HttpActionException.statusCode.
    HttpRequestException
    Indicate that an action could not be executed due to missing or incorrect HTTP request values.
  • Classes in org.actioncontroller.exceptions used by org.actioncontroller.httpserver 
    Class Description
    HttpActionException
    Indicates that an error happened during the invocation of an action and that the user agent should receive the HTTP HttpActionException.statusCode.
